name: MILHOUSE ENGINEERING AND CONSTRUCTION, INC, ON BEHALF OF COOK COUNTY DOT
sampleDescriptions: Post-enactment implementation of provisions impacting highways, freight rail, and commuter rail contained in the FAST Act (P.L. 114-94).Request support from Members seeking USDOT discretionary grants
Post-enactment implementation of provisions impacting highways, freight rail, and commuter rail contained in the FAST Act (P.L. 114-94).
Request support from Members of Congress seeking USDOT discretionary grants for transportation improvement projects and entry into USDOT programs (no bill number).
